segments.text: I see the water spilling over, and I’m just shocked by how much is pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying that plate like nothing is happening, and it’s unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and I can’t believe he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, and it’s surprising how calm she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed that no one has reacted to any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is completely wet, and it’s surprising that no one has slipped.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just full of surprises, and I don’t know what to expect next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so normal, which makes this even more surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m just waiting for someone to finally notice something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is all so unexpected and strange.
segments.speaker: PAR
